raw_body: JOSEPHINE SIVASAMBOO – It is with great sadness that the family of Mrs Josephine Sivasamboo announces her passing. Josephine was the loving wife of (late) T. Sivasamboo,​ mother of Ravi Sivasamboo,​ mother-in-law of Marianne,​ Grandmother of Christopher & Christina and great grandmother of Nathan. Final respects can be paid at Modern Florist Funeral Palour,​ No. 109,​ Negombo Road,​ Kandana. The burial takes place on Thursday,​ 5th October 2023 at the Welisara General Cemetery (opposite Phoenix Showroom) at 4.00 pm.063222
